title: Mad Rage Music pack
description: 10 Tracks in the rock style. Imbue your game with coolness, drive, and anarchic notes.
longDescription:
Amazing high-definition music pack. Listen HERE.

10 Tracks in the rock style. Imbue your game with coolness, drive, and anarchic notes.


Tracklist:


1. Hardcore Fighter

2. First Round

3. Blood

4. Opposition

5. Baby Fan

6. Second Wind

7. Victory


1. Hardcore Fighter

- Cool and Powerful Guitar Tunee

- Association: Aggression, Power, Boxing Ring, Speed, Fighter. Determination


2. First Round

- Pleasant music. Nostalgic atmosphere.

- Association: Beginning. Stir. Interest. Showdown. Preparation. Tension


3. Blood

- Aggressive guitar tune with synthesizers

- Association: Blood. Loosing. Pain. Chaos. Confusion


4. Opposition

- Cool and dynamic heavy metal song

- Association: Fighter. Continuation. Opposition. Revenge.Uncontrollably


5. Baby Fan

- Punchy rock song with a solo on guitar

- Association: Excitement. Fun. Happiness. Inspiration. Confidence. Spirit of warrior


6. Second Wind

- Drive song with a killer solo

- Association: Power. Confidence. Superiority. Will. Determination


7. Victory

- Triumphal melody with rock guitars and rock organ

- Association: Confidence. Happiness. Best. Victory. Positive.


8. Road Friendship


9. Epic Trip


10. Rock and Roll Rage


!Don't lose the opportunity to get up this powerful music for your game!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: r 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: NO

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
